thread.title: Dax Shepard and Michael Pe単a Become Your New Comedic Cop Duo in 'CHiPs' Trailer
thread.title_full: Dax Shepard and Michael Pe単a Become Your New Comedic Cop Duo in 'CHiPs' Trailer

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Dax Shepard and Michael Pe単a Become Your New Comedic Cop Duo in 'CHiPs' Trailer
text:
Your action-packed cop flick is back for 2017 while paying homage to the classic TV show from the '70s. Adding some comedy into the mix, Dax Shepard and Michael Pe単a play the roles of two highway patrol cops who are assigned to go undercover to investigate crooked cops within their respective unit. As the duo digs deeper and deeper into their assignment, they not only get to know one another, but run into loads of trouble while providing laughs on the ride.
Check out the debut trailer for CHiPs above which hits theaters on March 24 and let us know your thoughts.
Read more at Hypebeast.com
